channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Rubbish on pavement at side of 57 edmeston close wall, 30th July
item.description:
An overflowing bin, pile of loose rubbish and a pile of wood etc. partially blocking the pavement at side of 57 Edmeston close.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Edmeston Close, Hackney, London

item.title: Dumped wheelie bin and associated rubbish, 30th July
item.description:
A small green wheelie bin along with plastic bags of rubbish has been dumped outside No 11 Sundridge Avenue, obviously nothing to do with No 11. Also, on the pavement OPPOSITE No 9 there is a bag and box of dumped rubbish which has been there for a week now.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Liddon Road, Widmore, London

item.title: Traffic lights out. Danger. Could cause accident, 30th July
item.description:
Workers are aware temp traffic lights not working. Not done anything about it. Junction is chaos. Nearly got caught up between 2 cars. Massive hazard needs to be sorted out asap. Could cause problem if no one gives way / is being defensive. Junction no lights at all people going crazy. Drivers insane. No one knows way of right. Could cause a massive collision
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 121, Sevenoaks Way, St Paul's Cray, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot holes and road just cracking, 30th July
item.description:
As I live across the road, the vibration of large vehicles slamming the damage on this road is causing shake on the front of the house. Not only is this disturbing, itâ€™s also not safe for this continuous vibration and shake in the house. Also this could result in a vechile losing traction on the road depending on the speed (especially at late nights). Please can this get looked into.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Bellegrove Road, Falconwood, London
Report on FixMyStreet
